newsitem.title: USA: Acacia names Paul Ryan president and CEO.
newsitem.headline: Acacia names Paul Ryan president and CEO.

text.p: Acacia Research Corp said Monday it elected Paul Ryan president and chief executive.
A statement issued by the company did not say who Ryan was replacing and the company could not be reached for comment.
Ryan, who the company said began his association with Acacia Research in 1994, was most recently executive vice president and chief investment officer of the company.

Prior to joining Acacia Research, the company said Ryan was a General Partner of the American Health Care Fund LP and has 20 years experience investing in public and private companies as well as providing strategic management to a number of technology companies.
"Acacia Research has grown significantly over the past year and Paul Ryan has been instrumental in achieving this growth," said R. Bruce Stewart, chairman.
The company said its board also elected Kathryn King-Van Wie chief operating officer. King-Van Wie joined Acacia esearch in 1995 as vice president for operations.
Both appointments were approved on January 29, 1997 and took effect immediately.
